commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: This is Chika's house.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Is this a...ryokan inn?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Chika Takami lives in a ryokan? That's incredible!
Riko!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Whoa!

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Chika!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Riko, perfect timing. I was just about to go find you.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Me? For what?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Yeah! I came up with a new idea for the summer festival song and...

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Huh? You're...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Oh, um... I'm...

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Oh my gosh, are you a customer? Please forgive me! Umm, do you have a reservation?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: No, I don't. Actually, I didn't come here to stay in the ryokan.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Chika, this is a fan of ours that came all the way from Tokyo to meet us.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: To meet Aqours?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yes! I was hoping I might be able to talk with all of you.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Really? Wow, that makes me so happy. Sure thing! Come on in and let's talk.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Th-Thank you.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: This my room. I'm baaack!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Welcome back. Oh, I see you met up with Riko.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Hello. So you're here too, You.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Riko was right out front when I went outside!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Great. After you went out, I realized it'd probably be easier to call her.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: But you left your phone, so I couldn't tell you. Wait, who's that?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Ah, this is a fan of ours who came all the way from Tokyo to meet us! We're here to chat.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Nice to meet you.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Nice to meet you, too. Hey, relax a little.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Yeah, relax! You're probably the same age as us, right? Are you in high school?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yes, I'm a second-year student.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: That makes us the same age! That means no formalities. Welcome to Uchiura. Have a cracker or two.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Huh, so you came all the way to Uchiura. It must have been tough getting here.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Not really. It was a breeze knowing I'd be able to meet Aqours when I got here.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: That's so flattering, I'm actually a little embarrassed.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Hey, isn't your school, Nijigasaki, the one with the group that won that Tokyo school idol contest recently?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Wait, you've heard of my school?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Sure have! All the members in that group are so unique and charming. I couldn't avert my eyes for a second!

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Yeah, they were all great. The singing and dancing were at a high level, too.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: I don't mean anything bad by this, but I'd never heard of your school before. You appeared like a shooting star.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Really? I don't blame you. We only just started performing very recently.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: It's crazy to think Aqours would say that though. Everyone at Nijigasaki would be happy to hear it.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: *Giggle*

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: After I saw your performance with μ's, I took the leap into the world of school idols.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: The passion I felt watching that performance still lingers in my heart.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I'm pretty sure everyone else watching felt the same way.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I need to know what it takes to do that to people.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Can you tell me how you can put on such a charming performance?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Our charm? Well...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: What is it?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: I dunno, what IS it?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: What?

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: You mean like Aqours' strengths?

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: Not like that, more like how we get to our fans' hearts, right?

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Now that I think about it, I don't really know.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Y-You don't?

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: I think we're looking for that answer as well.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: I became an idol after seeing μ's perform. I wanted to shine like a sparkling jewel--just like they did on stage.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: But I realized that doesn't mean I should imitate them. So, I'm always thinking of how we can shine in our own way.

commands.speaker: Riko
commands.line: That's one of the reasons we're participating in the Summer Festival.

commands.speaker: You
commands.line: Yep. It's fun getting the local people excited, but we thought it might be a hint to finding our own way to shine.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Your own way to shine?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (I don't think they're talking about individuality. So that's what Aqours has been holding in their hearts.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: ("Shine"... I'm not sure I get it, but I think it's pretty important.)

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: (Maybe that's really important for our group, too. Searching for "our own way to shine.")
